detail_desc: 5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Made using Lycra® Freefit® technology for soft, super-generous stretch, maximum mobility and optimal comfort.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a zip fly and press stud, diagonal pockets with hook and loop fastening at the front and one flap back pocket. Snow flaps at the hems. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Earmuffs in velour with embroidery and appliqués. Polyester padding.
Playsuit in airy chiffon crêpe with a wrapover top and concealed press-stud at the front. Short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Jersey lining.
Wide, high-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a sewn-in tie belt and pleats at the top. Fly with a concealed zip, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a ballerina neckline and short sleeves. Unlined.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Fully lined bikini top with a tie detail at the front, underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, ties at the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Long shirt woven in a linen blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a roll-edge neckline, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringed edges. Size 70x170 cm.
Shirt in softly draping matt silk with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a high waist with a wide waistband, and straight wide legs with ribbed hems.
Mittens in woven fabric with narrow elastication at the wrists and a faux fur trim at the top. Size 2-6M without thumbs. Fleece lining.
Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets.

Sleeveless dress in an airy, patterned weave with a round neckline with gathers at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt with a wrapover front and longer back. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Lace, off-the-shoulder dress with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Elasticated flounce at the top, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Satin-covered Alice band decorated with faux fur and a metal crown on the top.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and legs with wide, flared hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Metal hoop earrings with a textured finish. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Shorts in soft denim made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend. Elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and side pockets. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and narrow hems.
Dress in a soft weave with buttons at the back of the neck, a frill-trimmed yoke that continues over the shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jersey leggings with a textured stripe and concealed zips at the back and hems.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.
Wide coat in soft faux fur with a hood, buttons and large patch pockets at the front. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs. Lined.
Microfibre bra with a scalloped trim at the top and underwired padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cord bracelets with small metal pendants and details.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton and silk jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Metal and plastic keyring with a padded faux fur heart, carabiner hook and decorative charms. Length 16 cm.
Loafers with a decorative seam at the front and metal buckle at the top. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Calf-length skirt in a silk blend with a high waist and concealed zip in one side.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a crackled finish. Zip in the side, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heels 6.5 cm.
Fine-knit, ribbed leggings in a soft cotton blend with elastic containing glittery threads at the waist and hems.
Long top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with a wide neckline and long sleeves. Straight cut with high slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jumpers in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Longer jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a slightly deeper V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a grandad collar, button placket, 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in a viscose crêpe weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.

Oval metal hair clips. Length 8 cm.
Cropped top in heavy jersey with a square neckline and long puff sleeves.
Imitation suede boots with a fold-down shaft and an opening at the back with a hook and loop fastening. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Striped bikini. Lined triangle top with triangle top with decorative tassels at the front, adjustable ties at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Fully lined bottoms with decorative ties at the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Jacquard-patterned socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey with an all-over print, ribbing around the neckline, and slits in the sides.
Shirt in a viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with a ballerina neckline and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Dog jumper in a soft cable knit with a ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs and back.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Oversized jacket in soft pile with sections in woven fabric. Stand-up collar, detachable hood, two-way zip down the front, side pockets and a zipped chest pocket. Lined.
Ankle-length, 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details and embroidery. High waist, zip fly and button and straight legs that flare at the hems.
Double-breasted coat in soft, brushed twill with a detachable faux fur collar, velvet-covered buttons and diagonal pockets at the front. Satin lining.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with a wide foldover top, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short velour top with a V-neck with a knot detail at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Flip-flops with straps in imitation patent leather. Imitation leather insoles and sturdy, fluted soles.
Shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, detachable belt at the waist and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a sweetheart neckline, long sleeves and straight hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in patterned Tencel™ lyocell with a turn-down collar, French front and straight hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Striped pyjamas in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with a notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.

Lined windbreaker in woven fabric with a detachable hood and print motif on the front. High collar, a zip at the top with a chin guard, concealed front pockets and long raglan sleeves with side stripes in a contrasting colour. Covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
